welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
# fnbr.js
This is lib for fortnite api lol

classes.name: Authenticator
classes.description: Represents the authentication manager of a client

props.name: Client
props.description: The main client

props.name: auths
props.description: The authentification data

props.name: reauths
props.description: The reauthentification data

props.name: account
props.description: The client's account

props.name: isRefreshing
props.description: Whether the client is currently reauthenticating

methods.name: refreshToken
methods.description: Checks if a token refresh is needed and reauthenticates if needed

params.name: forceVerify
params.description: Whether the access token should be verified

params.name: token
params.description: The basic token that will be used

params.name: tokenResponse
params.description: The response from the oauth token request

classes.name: Client
classes.description: The main client

props.name: config
props.description: The config of the client

props.name: isReady
props.description: Whether the client is ready or not

props.name: lastMemberMeta
props.description: The default party member meta of the client

props.name: user
props.description: The user of the client

props.name: party
props.description: The party that the client is currently in

props.name: Auth
props.description: The authentication manager of the client

props.name: Http
props.description: The HTTP manager of the client

props.name: Xmpp
props.description: The XMPP manager of the client

props.name: friends
props.description: The friends cache of the client's user

props.name: pendingFriends
props.description: The pending friends cache of the client's user

props.name: blockedFriends
props.description: The blocked friends cache of the client's user

props.name: makeCamelCase
props.description: Converts an object's keys to camel case

methods.name: updateCache
methods.description: Refreshes the client's friends (including pending and blocked)

params.name: create
params.description: Whether to create a new one after leaving the current one

methods.name: debug
methods.description: Debug a message via the debug function provided in the client's config (if provided)

params.name: message
params.description: The message that will be debugged

methods.name: waitForEvent
methods.description: Sleep until an event is emitted

params.name: event
params.description: The event will be waited for

methods.name: waitUntilReady
methods.description: Sleep until the client is ready

methods.name: mergeDefault
methods.description: Merges a default object with a given one

params.name: query
params.description: The id, name or email of the account(s) you want to fetch

params.name: status
params.description: The status message; can be null/undefined if you want to reset it

params.name: to
params.description: The display name or the id of the friend; can be undefined if you want to update the presence status for all friends

methods.name: addFriend
methods.description: Sends / accepts a friend request to an Epic Games user

params.name: user
params.description: The id, name or email of the user

methods.name: removeFriend
methods.description: Removes a friend or reject an user's friend request

params.name: user
params.description: The id, name or email of the user

params.name: friend
params.description: The id, name or email of the friend

params.name: friend
params.description: The id, name or email of the friend

methods.name: sendFriendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a friend

params.name: friend
params.description: The id or name of the friend

methods.name: invite
methods.description: Sends a party invitation to a friend

params.name: friend
params.description: The id or name of the friend

methods.name: getBRStats
methods.description: Fetches v2 stats for one or multiple players

params.name: user
params.description: The id, name or email of the user(s)

params.name: startTime
params.description: The timestamp to start fetching stats from; can be null/undefined for lifetime

params.name: endTime
params.description: The timestamp to stop fetching stats from; can be undefined for lifetime

params.name: showSimilar
params.description: Whether an array with similar creator codes should be returned

methods.name: getBRStore
methods.description: Fetches the current Battle Royale store

returns.description: The parsed Battle Royale store response

methods.name: makeCamelCase
methods.description: Convert an object's keys to camel case

params.name: obj
params.description: The object that will be converted

params.name: question
params.description: The text that will be prompted

methods.name: mergeDefault
methods.description: Merges a default object with a given one

classes.name: ClientPartyMember
classes.description: Represents the party member of a client

props.name: currentlyPatching
props.description: Whether the client's party member is currently sending a patch

props.name: patchQueue
props.description: Queue to push patches into while currentlyPatching is true

props.name: revision
props.description: The revision of the client's party member

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the party member

props.name: displayName
props.description: The display name of the party member

props.name: role
props.description: The role of the party member

props.name: joinedAt
props.description: The Date when this member joined the party

props.name: meta
props.description: The meta of this party member

props.name: pickaxe
props.description: The asset and id of this party member's pickaxe

props.name: outfit
props.description: The asset and id of this party member's outfit

props.name: emote
props.description: The asset and id of this party member's emote

props.name: isReady
props.description: Whether this party member is ready or not

props.name: isLeader
props.description: Whether this member is the leader of the party

methods.name: setReadiness
methods.description: Sets the readiness of the client's party member

params.name: ready
params.description: Whether the party member should be ready or not

methods.name: setLevel
methods.description: Sets the level of the client's party member

params.name: level
params.description: The level that will be set

methods.name: setBattlepass
methods.description: Sets the Battle Pass info of the party member

params.name: isPurchased
params.description: Whether the Battle Pass was purchased or not

methods.name: sendPatch
methods.description: Sends a patch with the latest meta

params.name: isForced
params.description: Whether the patch should ignore current patches

methods.name: kick
methods.description: Kicks this member from the party

methods.name: promote
methods.description: Promotes this member to the party leader

classes.name: ClientUser
classes.description: Represents the user of a client

props.name: name
props.description: The first name of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: lastName
props.description: The last name of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: email
props.description: The email of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: failedLoginAttempts
props.description: The number of failed login attempts of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: lastLogin
props.description: The last time somebody logged in on the client's Epic Games account

props.name: numberOfDisplayNameChanges
props.description: The number of display name changes of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: ageGroup
props.description: The age group of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: headless
props.description: Whether the account has no display name due to no epicgames account being linked

props.name: country
props.description: The country of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: preferredLanguage
props.description: The preferred language of the client's Epic Games account

props.name: canUpdateDisplayName
props.description: Whether the client's Epic Games account can update its display name

props.name: tfaEnabled
props.description: Whether a Two-Factor-Authentification method is enabled

props.name: emailVerified
props.description: Whether the email is verified (now required when creating accounts)

props.name: minorVerified
props.description: Whether the account has been verified to be run by a minor

props.name: minorExpected
props.description: Whether the account is expected to be run by a minor

props.name: minorStatus
props.description: The minor status of the client's Epic Games account

classes.name: CreatorCode
classes.description: Represents a Support-A-Creator code

props.name: code
props.description: The Support-A-Creator code

props.name: owner
props.description: The owner of the Support-A-Creator code

props.name: status
props.description: The status of a Support-A-Creator code

props.name: verified
props.description: Whether the Support-A-Creator code is verified

classes.name: Friend
classes.description: Represents an Epic Games friend of a client

props.name: connections
props.description: The connections of the friend

props.name: mutualFriends
props.description: The count of mutual friends

props.name: favorite
props.description: Whether this friend is a favourite one or not

props.name: createdAt
props.description: The date when the friendship was created

props.name: note
props.description: The note for this friend

props.name: alias
props.description: The alias of this friend

props.name: presence
props.description: The last recieved presence of this friend

props.name: isBlocked
props.description: Whether this friend is blocked or not

props.name: isOnline
props.description:
Whether a user is online or not
Can be inaccurate as it uses the receive date of the last presence

props.name: isJoinable
props.description:
Whether the client can join this friend's party or not
May be slighly inaccurate as it uses the last received presence

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to this friend

params.name: message
params.description: The message that will be sent

methods.name: invite
methods.description: Sends a party invitation to this friend

classes.name: FriendMessage
classes.description: Represents a friend message

props.name: content
props.description: The content of the friend message

props.name: author
props.description: The friend who sent the message

params.name: message
params.description: The message that will be sent

classes.name: FriendPresence
classes.description: Represents the presence of a friend

params.name: fromId
params.description: The id of friend this presence belongs to

props.name: friend
props.description: The friend this presence belongs to

props.name: status
props.description: The status of this friend presence

props.name: recievedAt
props.description: The date when this presence was recieved

props.name: isInKairos
props.description: Whether the friend is in Kairos (Party Hub) or not

props.name: isPlaying
props.description: Whether the friend is playing or not

props.name: isJoinable
props.description: Whether the friend's party is joinable or not

props.name: hasVoiceSupport
props.description: Whether the friend has voice support or not

props.name: sessionId
props.description: The id of the game session the friend is currently in

props.name: avatar
props.description: The Kairos avatar of this friend presence

props.name: homebaseRating
props.description: The rating of the friend's SaveTheWorld homebase

props.name: subGame
props.description: The subgame the friend is in

props.name: isInUnjoinableMatch
props.description: Whether the friend is in an unjoinable match or not

props.name: playlist
props.description: The friend's current selected playlist

props.name: partySize
props.description: The member count of the friend's party

props.name: partyMaxSize
props.description: The max members of the friend's party

props.name: gameSessionJoinKey
props.description: The join key of the game session the friend is currently in (if the game session is joinable)

props.name: gameplayStats
props.description: The stats of the game the friend is currently in

props.name: partyData
props.description: The data of the party this friend is currently in

params.description: Whether the patch should ignore current patches

params.name: member
params.description: The id or display name of the member that will be promoted

params.description: The member that will be kicked

classes.name: Http
classes.description: Represents the HTTP manager of a client

props.name: Client
props.description: The main client

props.name: jar
props.description: The cookie jar

props.name: options
props.description: The default requests options

params.description: Whether the access token should be checked if it's valid

classes.name: List
classes.description:
A Map used mainly for cached values throughout fnbr.js but with some extra functions.
Inspired by the simplicity of discord.js's collections.

params.name: iterable
params.description: The iterable that will be used to fill the List

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Finds a key in the List and returns its value
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/get

methods.name: set
methods.description:
Maps a key to a value
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/set

methods.name: delete
methods.description:
Finds a key and delets the key-value-pair
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/delete

params.name: key
params.description: key of the pair to delete

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Returns a list of all key-value-pairs

methods.name: find
methods.description: Finds a value with a function

methods.name: has
methods.description:
Checks if list has a key
https://developer.mozilla.org/en/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map/has

methods.name: some
methods.description: Checks if list has a value using a function

classes.name: XMPP
classes.description: Represents the XMPP manager of a client

props.description: The main client

props.description: The XMPP connection stream

props.name: connected
props.description: Whether the XMPP client is connected or not

props.name: isReconnecting
props.description: Whether the XMPP client is reconnecting or not

props.name: uuid
props.description: The XMPP client's UUID

props.name: resource
props.description: The XMPP client's resource

methods.name: setup
methods.description: Setups the XMPP stream and events

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects the XMPP client to Epic Games' services

params.name: isReconnect
params.description: Whether is a reconnection or not

params.name: status
params.description: The status message; can be null/undefined if you want to reset it

params.name: to
params.description: The XMPP address of the friend; can be undefined if you want to update the presence status for all friends

typedefs.name: PartyPrivacy
typedefs.description:
Represents the privacy of a party:
* `PUBLIC` - anyone can join the party
* `FRIENDS_ALLOW_FRIENDS_OF_FRIENDS` - the client's friends and their friends can join the party
* `FRIENDS` - the client's friends can join the party
* `PRIVATE_ALLOW_FRIENDS_OF_FRIENDS` - the client's friends and their friends can join the party only with an invite
* `PRIVATE` - party is not joinable without an invite from the leader

typedefs.name: Platform
typedefs.description:
Represents the platform of an online Fortnite player:
* `WINDOWS`
* `MAC`
* `PLAYSTATION`
* `XBOX`
* `SWITCH`
* `IOS`
* `ANDROID`

typedefs.name: Playlist
typedefs.description:
Represents a playlist:
* `SOLO`
* `DUO`
* `SQUAD`
* `CREATIVE` - creative don't fill
* `CREATIVE_PLAY` - creative fill

typedefs.name: Language
typedefs.description:
Represents a language (only the ones that are supported by Fortnite):
* `ARABIC`
* `GERMAN`
* `ENGLISH`
* `SPANISH`
* `FRENCH`
* `ITALIAN`
* `JAPANESE`
* `POLISH`
* `RUSSIAN`
* `TURKISH`

typedefs.name: Gamemode
typedefs.description:
Represents a Fortnite gamemode:
* `BATTLE_ROYALE`
* `CREATIVE`
* `SAVE_THE_WORLD`

typedefs.name: KairosColor
typedefs.description:
Represents a Kairos (Party Hub) profile color:
* `TEAL`
* `SWEET_RED`
* `LIGHT_ORANGE`
* `GREEN`
* `LIGHT_BLUE`
* `DARK_BLUE`
* `PINK`
* `RED`
* `GRAY`
* `ORANGE`
* `DARK_PURPLE`
* `LIME`
* `INDIGO`

typedefs.name: DefaultSkin
typedefs.description:
Represents a default skin:
* `FEMALE_1`
* `FEMALE_2`
* `FEMALE_3`
* `FEMALE_4`
* `MALE_1`
* `MALE_2`
* `MALE_3`
* `MALE_4`

typedefs.name: SeasonStart
typedefs.description:
Represents a season's start time:
* `CH1_S1`
* `CH1_S2`
* `CH1_S3`
* `CH1_S4`
* `CH1_S5`
* `CH1_S6`
* `CH1_S7`
* `CH1_S8`
* `CH1_S9`
* `CH1_S10`
* `CH2_S1`
* `CH2_S2`

typedefs.name: SeasonEnd
typedefs.description:
Represents a season's end time:
* `CH1_S1`
* `CH1_S2`
* `CH1_S3`
* `CH1_S4`
* `CH1_S5`
* `CH1_S6`
* `CH1_S7`
* `CH1_S8`
* `CH1_S9`
* `CH1_S10`
* `CH2_S1`
* `CH2_S2`

typedefs.name: CreatorCodeStatus
typedefs.description:
Represents a creator code status:
* `ACTIVE`
* `INACTIVE`

typedefs.name: PendingFriendDirection
typedefs.description:
Represents a pending friend's direction:

* `OUTGOING`

props.description: Whether the friend died

props.name: serverPlayerCount
props.description: The player count on the gameplay's server

typedefs.name: FPPartyData
typedefs.description: Contains data about a friend's party

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the party

props.name: isPrivate
props.description: Whether the party is private or not

props.name: memberCount
props.description: The party's member count

props.name: platform
props.description: The party's platform

props.name: buildId
props.description: The party's build id

typedefs.name: BasicToken
typedefs.description:
Represents a Fortnite basic access token:
* `LAUNCHER_WINDOWS`
* `FORTNITE_WINDOWS`
* `FORTNITE_IOS`

typedefs.name: PartyLock
typedefs.description:
The client's party lock
Used for delaying all party-related xmpp events while changes to client's party are made

props.name: active
props.description: Indicates if the party lock is active

props.name: wait
props.description: Sleep until party lock is no longer active

typedefs.name: ReauthLock
typedefs.description:
The client's reauthentication lock
Used for delaying all Http requests while the client is reauthenticating

props.name: active
props.description: Indicates if the reauthentication lock is active

props.name: wait
props.description: Sleep until reauthentication lock is no longer active
